message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. While I appreciate your interest, $12500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13500. This price still leaves room for both of us to benefit from the deal. Let me know if you're interested.

Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. This is the highest price I'm willing to go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
